title: Episode 308 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Primary source for episode information including title, air dates, staff credits, and episode summary. Contains detailed information about the episode's events and production details.

title: Chapter 426 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Source for manga adaptation information. Episode 308 primarily adapts Chapter 426 titled 'A Ship Waiting for Wind'.

title: Crazy Rainbow - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Source for opening theme information. Confirms 'Crazy Rainbow' by Tackey & Tsubasa was used for episodes 284-325.

title: Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Leopard - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Source for Rob Lucci's Devil Fruit abilities and how the leopard hybrid form enhances his techniques.

title: Rokuogan - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Detailed information about the Rokuougan technique, described as the secret seventh Rokushiki technique accessible only to masters. Explains how it creates devastating shockwaves that can bypass rubber defenses.

title: Rob Lucci - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Source for Rob Lucci's character information, including his Doriki rating of 4000 and status as CP9's strongest member.

title: Usopp - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Source for Usopp's character information and the significance of his Sogeking alter ego during the Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs.

title: Did Luffy know who Sogeking is? - Anime & Manga Stack Exchange
author: Various Contributors
notes: Fan discussion about whether Luffy knew Sogeking's identity. Provides various perspectives on episode 308's reveal scene and its implications.

title: One Piece: Usopp's Sogeking, Explained
author: Game Rant Staff
notes: Analysis article explaining the Sogeking persona and its significance in Usopp's character development during the Water 7 Saga.

title: One Piece: How Strong is Rob Lucci?
author: Game Rant Staff
notes: Analysis of Rob Lucci's power level, Doriki rating, and fighting abilities including the Rokuougan technique.

title: One Piece: The Enies Lobby Arc, Explained
author: Game Rant Staff
notes: Comprehensive explanation of the Enies Lobby arc, providing context for episode 308's place in the overall story.

title: One Piece | Enies Lobby Arc | Summary, Recap, & Review
author: Poggers Staff
notes: Detailed recap and review of the Enies Lobby arc, describing it as 'peak One Piece' with excellent story and action.

title: One Piece: The 10 Best Episodes Of The Enies Lobby Arc (According To IMDb)
author: CBR Staff
notes: Ranking of the best Enies Lobby episodes based on IMDb ratings, providing context for episode 308's reception.

title: Luffy vs Lucci - Animated Battles Wiki
author: Animated Battles Wiki Contributors
notes: Detailed breakdown of the Luffy vs. Lucci battle, including techniques used and battle progression.

title: One Piece Eps 308-310 - One Piece With A Lime Podcast
author: One Piece With A Lime
notes: Podcast episode discussing episodes 308-310, providing fan perspective and analysis of the Luffy vs. Lucci climax.

author: Never Watched One Piece

author: Wiki Contributors
